home.buyFirst: Buy your first random monster to start

goldenReward.title: Golden Monster Reward Range
goldenReward.rulesHigh: Contract balance > 1 SUI: reward is 1% to 50% of current balance (random).
goldenReward.rulesLow: Contract balance ≤ 1 SUI: reward is fixed 0.01 to 0.1 SUI (random).
goldenReward.timeout: Golden monster must be battled within 10 minutes, otherwise it escapes.

battleInfoModal.title: Battle Info
battleInfoModal.tipSaveKeyOnCommit: Save the secret locally when submitting a commitment.
battleInfoModal.tipKeyNeededOnReveal: The local secret is required for reveal.
battleInfoModal.tipKeyLostWarning: If the local secret is lost, you cannot reveal.
battleInfoModal.goldenSubmitWithin: Submit battle commitment within 10 minutes after encounter.
battleInfoModal.goldenCountdownDisable: After countdown ends, buttons disable; you need a new encounter.
battleInfoModal.goldenRewardSnapshotNote: Reward range is based on encounter snapshot and capped by contract balance.
battleInfoModal.goldenCountdownDisclaimer: Page countdown is for reference; on-chain time prevails.

captureInfoModal.title: Capture Info
captureInfoModal.tipSaveKeyOnCommit: Save the secret locally when submitting a commitment.
captureInfoModal.tipKeyNeededOnReveal: The local secret is required for reveal.
captureInfoModal.tipKeyLostWarning: If the local secret is lost, you cannot reveal.

winProbModal.goldenTypeWinRatesTitle: Win rates for different golden monster types:
winProbModal.goldenWinRateNote: Golden monster win rate depends only on player's NFT type; unaffected by level and element.

captureProbModal.title: Capture Probability Details
captureProbModal.captureLevelNote: Captured NFT is minted as Lv.3.

capturePenaltyModal.title: Level Penalty Explanation
capturePenaltyModal.ruleHigherLevel: Higher level, lower penalty; no penalty at Lv10.
capturePenaltyModal.formulaFinal: Final capture probability = Base × (100% − penalty rate).
capturePenaltyModal.sameTypeOrder: Same-type bonus (+10%) is applied before penalty.

blockchainTime.title: Blockchain Time vs Local Time
blockchainTime.noteUTC: Sui blockchain uses UTC as the standard time
blockchainTime.noteClock: ChainTime object provides on-chain timestamp (ms precision)
blockchainTime.noteDeploy: Deploy time is validator-provided world time
blockchainTime.noteDelay: Time difference is usually within seconds due to network latency and processing
blockchainTime.noteIdeal: Ideally the difference should be less than 1 second

infoPanel.viewElementProbDetail: View element probabilities and advantage details
infoPanel.viewTypeProbDetail: View how type probabilities vary with level
infoPanel.viewGoldenRewardDetail: View golden monster reward range explanation
infoPanel.cooldownRuleStart: Cooldown starts at 1 minute at Lv1 and doubles each level
infoPanel.battleDelayRuleStart: Delay starts at 30 seconds at Lv1 and doubles each level
infoPanel.elementProbExplanationIntro: Element appearance probability depends on current season and date position:
infoPanel.seasonMiddleDesc: At season middle: main 70%, two secondary 10% each, third 5%, earth 5%
infoPanel.seasonBoundaryDesc: At season boundary: main 40%, two secondary 22.5% each, third 10%, earth 5%
infoPanel.earthPeriodDesc: During earth period: earth 50%, other four 12.5% each
infoPanel.probLinearDesc: Probabilities change linearly with position in season
infoPanel.advantageExplanationText: Following the Five Elements theory: Metal restrains Wood, Wood restrains Earth, Earth restrains Water, Water restrains Fire, Fire restrains Metal. In battle, advantage increases win probability; disadvantage decreases it.
infoPanel.probabilitiesComputedNote: The above probabilities are computed from current season and date position.
infoPanel.goldenProbRuleLevelInc: Golden monster probability increases with level: 0.5% at Lv1 to 9% at Lv9
infoPanel.goldenProbRuleCounter: If player's element counters current season (counter-season), probability doubles
infoPanel.goldenProbRuleDefeated: If you have defeated a golden monster before, the appearance probability will be 0%
infoPanel.title: Game Info
infoPanel.goldenDefeatedNotice: Current probability is 0%. You can trade this NFT to reset it, or buy a new one.
infoPanel.typeProbChangesTitle: Type probability changes from Lv1 to Lv10:

market.cannotBuyOwn: You cannot buy your own listed NFT
market.fetchListingHistoryFailPrefix: Failed to load listing history NFTs:
market.cannotListBattling: NFT is in battle or capture, cannot list
market.purchaseLevelNote: Purchased NFTs are minted as Lv.3.
market.noListablesOrListings: No NFTs to list or already listed.

bottom.libraryDesc: Shows your owned NFTs (excluding listed). Choose one as active.
bottom.noAvailable: No available NFTs. You can buy a new one.

about.title: About SUU — Fully Decentralized On-chain Game
about.learnLine1: SUU is a battle-and-capture NFT game on Sui.
about.learnLine2: All core logic, assets, and trades are done on-chain—verifiable and trustless.
about.purchase: Use 1 SUI to purchase a beam-type bam to start playing.
about.capture: When encountering a capturable monster, spend 0.5 SUI to attempt capture.
about.fees: ~99% of transaction fees performed on-chain go into the public pool.
about.reward: When encountering the SUI reward monster and winning, you receive 1%–50% of the pool (on-chain verifiable).
about.uniqueness: NFT uniqueness probability is 0.000405%, ensuring high collectibility.
about.source: Images from boringavatars are used for display; in-game they are called bam (boringavatars monster).
about.onchain: Minting, trading, and reward settlements happen on-chain, publicly and transparently.
about.decentralizationDesc: Core game logic (buy, battle, capture, trade, pool distribution) is all smart-contract based; verify via Sui Explorer.
about.explorerTip: For more, check transaction/event logs in Explorer, and watch network/contract IDs in frontend config.

Probability: {prob}%
You need to randomize a new enemy to continue.

safety.title: Safety & Compliance

nonCustodial.title: 1. Non‑custodial
nonCustodial.item1: We do not custody your wallet, seed phrase, or on-chain assets.
nonCustodial.item2: Transactions are executed directly by you with the blockchain via smart contracts.
nonCustodial.item3: We do not provide fund custody, wealth management, or transfer services.
nonCustodial.item4: Keep your seed phrase/private key safe and sign only in trusted wallets.

collectibles.title: 2. Collectible game items/artworks (no profit promise)
collectibles.item1: NFTs are collectible game items/artworks for entertainment and collection.
collectibles.item2: They are not investment products or securities; no profit, dividend, or principal guarantee.
collectibles.item3: Prices and rarity are influenced by market and gameplay; risk of fluctuation and loss.
collectibles.item4: Participate rationally and do not rely on expected returns.

privacy.title: 3. Privacy & Data Security
privacy.item1: We follow data minimization, only collecting technical data necessary to provide service.
privacy.item2: We do not store your private key or signed contents; on-chain interactions use public verifiable data.
privacy.item3: Local storage/cookies may save language or session preferences; you can manage them in your browser.
privacy.item4: Avoid unsafe networks; do not expose personal sensitive information.

minor.title: 4. Protection of Minors
minor.item1: We do not encourage minors to engage in blockchain transactions.
minor.item2: Minors should only experience under guardian guidance for entertainment/learning purposes.
minor.item3: We do not provide financial guidance or profit-oriented promotions to minors.

safety.footer: This page helps you participate and collect safely and rationally. For more information, check the homepage or contact maintainers.
